item.title: Neon Acquires North American Rights to Japanese Thriller ‘Exit 8’
item.description: Neon has acquired the North American rights to the Japanese thriller “Exit 8.” The film screened as part of the Midnight section at this year’s Cannes Film Festival and will have its
